item.title: 春天向前走 "这句话早在幼儿园就已经教过了，但这个概念仍然让许多成年人感到困惑。但为什么我们要在每年春天把时钟拨快？
item.description:
'Spring forward' is a phrase taught as early as kindergarten, but a concept that still stumps many adults.

Years of debate and two world wars have followed the age-old tradition. But why do we set our clocks forward each spring?https://t.co/Y51xFEe2F6 pic.twitter.com/HeQrHrHLso

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 根据新的研究，美国一些沿海城市正在 "消失 "在地面上，这可能会在不久的将来进一步加剧海平面上升的复杂性。
item.description:
Several coastal cities around the United States are "disappearing" into the ground, according to new research — which could further exacerbate complications of sea level rise in the near future. https://t.co/inaDtjAmZ7 pic.twitter.com/6LK3JWGgzO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 研究显示，四名先天性艾滋病病毒感染儿童在暂停接受艾滋病药物治疗一年多后，仍能保持无病毒状态。

item.title: 芭比娃娃就要 65 岁了！为了庆祝这个标志性娃娃即将到来的里程碑式生日，美泰将推出一款灵感源自 1959 年原版的新娃娃。新娃娃的服装和配饰向原版娃娃深受喜爱的泳装造型的复古风格致敬。
item.description:
Barbie is turning 65!

To celebrate the iconic doll's upcoming milestone birthday, Mattel is releasing a new doll inspired by the 1959 original. The new doll's ensemble and accessories are a nod to the retro style of the original's beloved swimsuit look. https://t.co/tk0C2dgjSb pic.twitter.com/oN02wDarR5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 本周，宾夕法尼亚州一名妇女被一只母熊带着幼崽咬伤后住院，她在病床上讲述了这起无耻的动物袭击事件：
item.description:
A Pennsylvania woman was hospitalized after being mauled by a mother bear with her cubs this week and is recounting the brazen animal attack from her hospital bed.

More here: https://t.co/4vZw9ZxNKM pic.twitter.com/8ZnKhtPr1n

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 根据哥白尼的一份新报告，地球已连续九个月打破最热月记录。全球大部分海洋的海面温度仍处于前所未有的水平。
item.description:
Planet Earth has now broken warmest-month records for nine months in a row, according to a new report by Copernicus.

Global sea surface temperatures across a majority of the world’s oceans remain at unprecedented levels.https://t.co/zmcDBpGr14 pic.twitter.com/HD5xrR2l6q

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）周三表示，纽约国民警卫队和纽约州警察将被部署到纽约市地铁系统，以帮助乘客在交通犯罪激增后获得安全感。
item.description:
New York National Guard troops and New York State Police troopers will be deployed into the NYC subway system to help riders feel safe after a spike in transit crime, Gov. Kathy Hochul said Wednesday. https://t.co/xgIVOxepjZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: "拜登总统在周三的一份声明中说："唐纳德-特朗普明确表示，他不想要尼基-海利的支持者。"拜登总统在周三的声明中说："我想明确一点：他们在我的竞选活动中占有一席之地。
item.description:

item.title: 研究人员说，最近在马萨诸塞州的南塔克特岛海岸发现了一头灰鲸，该物种被认为在大西洋灭绝已有 200 年之久。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 据美国国家运输安全委员会（National Transportation Safety Board）的一名官员称，周一晚上，一架单引擎飞机在飞行员报告发动机完全失去动力后坠毁在田纳西州纳什维尔的一条高速公路上，造成包括三名儿童在内的五人死亡。
item.description:
Five people, including three children, died when a single-engine plane crashed into a Nashville, Tennessee, highway after the pilot reported a total loss of engine power on Monday night, according to a National Transportation Safety Board official.https://t.co/flDXjJTyh7 pic.twitter.com/FxdBxocmpJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：在高等法院裁定胚胎是儿童的几周后，阿拉巴马州州长签署了一项允许恢复试管婴儿治疗的法案，使其成为法律。
item.description:
BREAKING: A bill to allow IVF treatments to resume in Alabama has been signed into law by the governor weeks after a high court ruled that embryos are children. https://t.co/RPw9MZtwSs pic.twitter.com/k9P83sFCFh

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 一架配备降落伞的小型飞机坠毁在华盛顿州贝尔维尤的一个社区。官方称飞机起飞后不久因引擎故障坠毁，机上无人受伤。
item.description:
A small plane equipped with a parachute crashed into a neighborhood in Bellevue, Washington. Officials say the plane went down shortly after takeoff due to an engine failure.

No one onboard was injured. https://t.co/ibUBlTZUmg pic.twitter.com/bEIs5Bl0vj

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 阿拉巴马州一项保护本州体外受精治疗的法案已获州议会批准，并已提交州长审批。
